Package ohos.ai.cv.docrefine

Interface IDocRefine

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICvBase

    public interface IDocRefine
extends ICvBase
    Provides document refinement (DocRefine) function.

    Text detection detects text in a document image and returns the corner coordinates of text in the document. Document refinement adjusts the corner coordinates based on the input image and coordinates. It is recommended that images with a width ranging from 1080 pixels to 2560 pixels be used for document refinement.

    This interface provides two process modes. The MODE_IN mode indicates that the SDK directly invokes the DocRefine function in the caller process. The MODE_OUT mode indicates that the SDK functions as a client to send a calling request to the HUAWEI HiAI Engine, which performs DocRefine and returns the result to the caller.

    This interface also provides two block modes. In synchronous mode, the calling is blocked in the docDetect or docRefine method until the cooresponding processing is complete. In asynchronous mode, the docDetect or docRefine method is returned immediately, and the cooresponding processing result is returned to the caller in callback mode.

    Since:
    1

    • Method Detail

      • docDetect

        int docDetect​(VisionImage image,
              DocCoordinates result,
              VisionCallback<DocCoordinates> visionCallBack)
        Performs text detection on a given image and returns the result code.

        This method detects text in an input image, and returns the corner coordinates of the document bounding box either by using DocCoordinates or a callback.

        Parameters:
        image - Indicates an input image.
        result - Indicates the data type for storing corner coordinates in synchronous mode.
        visionCallBack - Indicates the callback class to use.
        • If this parameter is null, docDetect is called synchronously, and the DocCoordinates after detection is output from the result parameter.
        • If this parameter is not null, docDetect is called asynchronously, and the result parameter should be null. When the asynchronous call is successful, the DocCoordinates after detection can be obtained from onResult, or an error code is passed from onError.
        Returns:
        Returns HwHiAIResultCode.AIRESULT_SUCCESS if the synchronous call is successful; returns an error code otherwise.

        Returns HwHiAIResultCode.AIRESULT_ASYNC_MODE if the asynchronous call is successful; returns an error code if any input parameter is invalid.

        For more information, see HwHiAIResultCode.

        Since:
        1

      • docRefine

        int docRefine​(VisionImage image,
              DocCoordinates coordinates,
              ImageResult result,
              VisionCallback<ImageResult> visionCallBack)
        Performs document refinement on a given image and returns the result code.

        This method adjusts the coordinates of the document bounding box based on the input image and coordinates and returns the result by using ImageResult or a callback.

        Parameters:
        image - Indicates an input image.
        coordinates - Indicates the data type for storing corner coordinates.
        result - Indicates the output image after document refinement in synchronous mode.
        visionCallBack - Indicates the callback class to use.
        • If this parameter is null, docRefine is called synchronously, and the image after DocRefine is output from the result parameter.
        • If this parameter is not null, docRefine is called asynchronously, and the result parameter should be null. When the asynchronous call is successful, the image after DocRefine can be obtained from onResult, or an error code is passed from onError.
        Returns:
        Returns HwHiAIResultCode.AIRESULT_SUCCESS if the synchronous call is successful; returns an error code otherwise.

        Returns HwHiAIResultCode.AIRESULT_ASYNC_MODE if the asynchronous call is successful; returns an error code if any input parameter is invalid.

        For more information, see HwHiAIResultCode.

        Since:
        1

      • setVisionConfiguration

        void setVisionConfiguration​(DocRefineConfiguration docRefineConfiguration)
        Sets document refinement parameters.

        This method uses DocRefineConfiguration to set parameters.

        Parameters:
        docRefineConfiguration - Indicates the data type of a document refinement parameter.
        Since:
        1
